column4: takamarou:I was lucky enough to install (triple boot temporarily) xubuntu and that grub did the work for me.
Sikth:the basic way to connect a programs output to anothers input is with a pipe |,the ; allows only one command
takamarou:its cool yes. its what worked for me. Just find a solid distro
if one command fails, will the rest continue, or stop with piping?
